This is my second Microhearth. I've had my first one for about 6 months. I ordered this one with the older style lid to be kept in my RV. I have fixed chicken, steak, pork chops, and even bacon. Wonderful that it browns in the MW without drying out the meat or having a microwaved meat taste.
